description:
Reentrancy in LockPayments.createBatch(address[],uint256[],uint256,address) (contracts/LockPayments.sol#75-91):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(IERC20(paymentToken).transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),total)) (contracts/LockPayments.sol#89)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBatches += 1 (contracts/LockPayments.sol#90)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [LockPayments.createBatch(address[],uint256[],uint256,address)](contracts/LockPayments.sol#L75-L91):
	External calls:
	- [require(bool)(IERC20(paymentToken).transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),total))](contracts/LockPayments.sol#L89)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [totalBatches += 1](contracts/LockPayments.sol#L90)

description:
CoinchainToken.constructor(string,string,uint256,address,address).WETH (contracts/CoinchainToken.sol#45) lacks a zero-check on :
		- pairAddress = generatePairAddress(address(this),WETH) (contracts/CoinchainToken.sol#50)

LockPayments.disperseBatch(uint256) (contracts/LockPayments.sol#154-164) has external calls inside a loop: require(bool)(IERC20(batches[batchId].paymentToken).transfer(addr,amount)) (contracts/LockPayments.sol#160)
markdown: [LockPayments.disperseBatch(uint256)](contracts/LockPayments.sol#L154-L164) has external calls inside a loop: [require(bool)(IERC20(batches[batchId].paymentToken).transfer(addr,amount))](contracts/LockPayments.sol#L160)

description:
LockPayments.createBatch(address[],uint256[],uint256,address) (contracts/LockPayments.sol#75-91) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(dueDate > block.timestamp,Error: Invalid Due Date) (contracts/LockPayments.sol#76)
markdown:
[LockPayments.createBatch(address[],uint256[],uint256,address)](contracts/LockPayments.sol#L75-L91) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [require(bool,string)(dueDate > block.timestamp,Error: Invalid Due Date)](contracts/LockPayments.sol#L76)

elements.name: require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= batches[batchId].dueDate,Error: Batch due date not met)

description: Pragma version^0.8.11 (contracts/Mocks/ERC20Mock.sol#2) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.12/0.7.6/0.8.7
markdown: Pragma version[^0.8.11](contracts/Mocks/ERC20Mock.sol#L2) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.12/0.7.6/0.8.7

description:

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
